title: The Phantom Diaries
description: What happens to the Phantom after the tragedy at the Paris Opera House is the basis for this fantastic tale of The Phantom Diaries, loosely based on Gaston Leroux's classic, The Phantom of the Opera, but with a new tale and a modern twist. This new series for older teens and young adults is told through the eyes of 18 year-old Annette Binoche, who lands a job at the New York Metropolitan Opera House as a seamstress' assistant only to become the lead singer of the Opera House, with the help of the mysterious, yet highly-seductive Phantom.You do not need to read or know the story of Phantom of the Opera to read The Phantom Diaries Series.Disclaimer: Do not expect this to be just like Phantom of the Opera.View the Official Book Series Trailer:http://youtu.be/UC2A9ZN0ul4
author: Kailin Gow
